description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. SSRGFM is a parody of  "low-brow" Genres.  Surround Sound (SS) Test your 5.1 home theater with fart sounds.  Remote-controlled Gopher Farting (RGF) Battle against other gophers for supremacy.  Masseuse  (M) Reduce stress levels by using 1-4 vibrating controllers.  Complete with a cornucopia of ridiculous awards, this title is guaranteed to keep you and your friends immersed for hours!
description.short: SSRGFM is a parody of  "low-brow" Genres.  Surround Sound (SS) Test your 5.1 home theater with fart sounds.  Remote-controlled Gopher Farting (RGF) Battle against other gophers for supremacy.  Masseuse  (M) Reduce stress levels by using 1-4 vibrating controllers.  Complete with a cornucopia of ridiculous awards, this title is guaranteed to keep you and your friends immersed for hours!
